name: mlsimport
description: Since mlsimport uses a php binary, it is necessary to sls deploy it using a linux/unix machine. One solution is to use docker. Follow the instructions below. 1. Install docker 2. `cd functions` 3. `docker build mlsimport` 4. run `docker images` and find the image_id 5. to deploy, run `docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID={key_here} -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY={key_here} {image_id}`
